commit.message:
Feature/deploy on change package (#144)

* get sgd package for deploy on change

* deploy sharing rules on changes

* use dynamic targetusername in retrieve

* [Mega-Linter] Apply linters fixes

* Refactor using sfdx git delta

* Send options to deployUtils (with targetUsername)

* VsCode better debugging

* Manage correct update of installed package versions

* Rename variables

* git reset --hard to discard retrieved files

* [Mega-Linter] Apply linters fixes

* Do not deploy standalone sharing rules (without sharing owner rules)

* Create docker images with sfdx-cli@stable version

  - alpha-sfdx-stable
  - beta-sfdx-stable
  - latest-sfdx-stable

* typo

* [Mega-Linter] Apply linters fixes

* QuickFix

Co-authored-by: alli <alex.li@hardis-group.com>
Co-authored-by: AlexLi-png <AlexLi-png@users.noreply.github.com>
Co-authored-by: Nicolas Vuillamy <nicolas.vuillamy@gmail.com>
Co-authored-by: nvuillam <nvuillam@users.noreply.github.com>
